channel.title: Fuujiya - Jus Sayin
channel.description:
If I can make one persons day better by them listening to my music. That’s worth more than any amount of plays & views.
https://soundcloud.com/fuujiya/jus-sayin

item.title: Fuujiya - Jus Sayin
item.dc:creator: Fuujiya
item.description:
Yeah I should have gone for that lol but for this track I wanted to keep it so simple & repetitive that it’s memorable…maybe lol
Anywho I’ll take that to consider for the next few tracks I have :3

Read full topic

item.title: Fuujiya - Jus Sayin
item.dc:creator: paroxyzm
item.description:
Super chill, its great. I understand that this type of style doesn’t typically have much variation but I reckon maybe changing up the melody or the chord progression every now and again could do wonders. You don’t want it to be too repetitive, however I do love how you varied the drums a lot throughout this. Other than that its a great track.
